title: How does the creation process evolve according to the triangle reversal and the symbolism of the planets?
first_phrase: The text explores the process of creation as it progresses from the divine intelligence to the physical world through materialization. The last part, Immaginazione 3, Act Creativo 4, Creazione Rovesciando il triangolo, delves into the symbolism of the Alexandrine School of Philosophy and how it compares human creation to a chrysalis metamorphosis. It explains how the transmutation process occurs through fire, and how the different types of solar and lunar symbolism reduce the Will's different grades to two opposing natures. The text concludes by describing the neutral type, Mercurio, which symbolizes the perfect balance between intelligence and will.
